name: chatgpt-quick-access
description: Chrome/Edge extension to quickly open ChatGPT with keyboard shortcuts

scripts.build: npm run sync-version && vite build && npm run copy-manifest && npm run copy-icons && npm run fix-icons && npm run update-manifest
scripts.version:patch: node -e "const pkg=require('./package.json'); pkg.version=pkg.version.replace(/(\d+)\.(\d+)\.(\d+)/, (_,a,b,c)=>`${a}.${b}.${parseInt(c)+1}`); require('fs').writeFileSync('package.json', JSON.stringify(pkg, null, 2));" && npm run sync-version
scripts.version:minor: node -e "const pkg=require('./package.json'); pkg.version=pkg.version.replace(/(\d+)\.(\d+)\.(\d+)/, (_,a,b)=>`${a}.${parseInt(b)+1}.0`); require('fs').writeFileSync('package.json', JSON.stringify(pkg, null, 2));" && npm run sync-version
scripts.version:major: node -e "const pkg=require('./package.json'); pkg.version=pkg.version.replace(/(\d+)\.(\d+)\.(\d+)/, (_,a)=>`${parseInt(a)+1}.0.0`); require('fs').writeFileSync('package.json', JSON.stringify(pkg, null, 2));" && npm run sync-version
scripts.version:preview: node -e "const pkg=require('./package.json'); pkg.version=pkg.version.replace(/(\d+)\.(\d+)\.(\d+)/, (_,a,b,c)=>`${a}.${b}.${parseInt(c)+1}-beta.0`); require('fs').writeFileSync('package.json', JSON.stringify(pkg, null, 2));" && npm run sync-version
scripts.release:full: npm run release && npm run zip
scripts.rebuild: npm run clean && npm run build
